item.title: Setup a Public Samba Share
item.description: Install Samba apt-get install samba Configure Samba Below configuration will create a new samba share which can be accessed by anybody on the network without entering any credentials. nano /etc/samba/smb.conf Contents of smb.conf [global] workgroup = WORKGROUP server string = Samba Server %v netbios name = WDMyCloud security = user map to guest = bad user dns proxy = no [Public] path = /data/shares/Public force group = users create mask = 0660 directory mask = 0771 browsable =yes writable = yes guest ok = yes Restart Samba Service The samba service has to restarted each time to use the new configuration.
